product_name: Black Diamond Lift-Off Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: The lightweight, breathable Black Diamond Lift-Off Pants are perfect for summer rock climbs where you need full, durable protection. They have a relaxed fit for excellent freedom of movement. Blend of cotton and nylon is soft to the touch yet stands up to frequent wear while climbing. Harness-compatible waist adjustment lets you fine-tune the fit. Include 2 front hand pockets, 2 rear pockets and a smartphone-friendly pocket. Climbing-specific inseam gusset allows great range of motion. Black Diamond Lift-Off Pants have cuffs that are easy to roll up for climbing.
